attributes.action: stop scottish,welsh & ulster mps from voting on english matters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Scotland,Wales & N.Ireland have their own Parliaments/Assembles under which the House of Commons have no control I seee no reason why these MPs should have any say or vote in any issue that concerns England only. To do so is making a mockery of democracy.Either ban these MPs from voting or set up an independant English Assembly. Independance works both ways,not just for one side.
